authors.author: Emily E.S. Elliott Timothy Richard Matthews

verse.name: c1a
verse.lines: O come to my heart, Lord Jesus.

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines: There is room in my heart for Thee.

verse.name: c2a
verse.lines: My heart shall rejoice, Lord Jesus,

verse.name: c2b
verse.lines: When Thou comest and callest for me.

verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
Thou didst leave Thy throne
And Thy kingly crown,
When Thou camest to earth for me.

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
But in Bethlehem's home
Was there found no room
For Thy holy nativity.

verse.name: v2a
v2b
verse.lines:
But of lowly birth,
Didst Thou come to earth
And in great humility.

verse.name: v3a
v3b
verse.lines:
But Thy couch was the sod,
O Thou Son of God,
In the deserts of Galilee.

verse.name: v4a
v4b
verse.lines:
But with mocking scorn
And with crown of thorn,
They bore Thee to Calvary.

verse.name: v5a
v5b
verse.lines:
Let Thy voice call me home,
Saying, "Yet there is room,
There is room at My side for thee."
